author: Loren Grush
title: Jeff Bezos’ space company is pressuring employees to launch a tourist rocket during the pandemic
description: Employees at Jeff Bezos’ aerospace firm Blue Origin are outraged that senior leadership is pressuring workers to travel to rural West Texas to conduct a test launch of the company’s New Shepard rocket, which is designed to take wealthy tourists into space. Ma…
